stories.text: Of all the financial institutions I have been dealing with, there is only one, so far, but interesting, nonetheless, with their ongoing monitoring of "dark web" (their definition of such being "The dark web is a network of unsafe websites where people can trade and sell your data anonymously.") and reporting on any activity associated with my identity. The process of reporting started sometimes in Sept of 2021, with maybe a report every couple of weeks, but the reports of activity detected increased 100+ times since Feb 23rd, 2022 (for obvious reasons).
stories.title: Tell HN: Some financial institutions report on “dark web” client ID appearance

stories.text:
Ask your friends at Google to explain this joke donation of Adwords credit: https://www.androidcentral.com/google-response-ukraine-invasion

Ukraine needs real support not using this crisis to push your product!

If you want to make a statement switch off Google services in Russia. That is how revolutions are started!

Google makes less than %0.3 of their total revenue in Russia. Surely that is worth a sacrifice to end this unfair war and tell Russia they cannot invade their neighbors!
stories.title: Google announces support for Ukraine by giving $2M in Adwords credit
